mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(ExHoSeq) ExHoSeq FROM covi_smart4j.attendance_mng_ExtensionHoliday WHERE JobStsName = #{JobStsName} AND IFNULL(ApprovalSts,'') <> 'N'
(UserCode = #{item.UserCode} AND JOBDATE = #{item.WorkDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(str_to_date(StartTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), '%H%i') = #{item.StartTime})

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(str_to_date(concat(DATE_FORMAT(#{JobDate},'%Y%m%d'), #{StartTime}),'%Y%m%d%H%i'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') oAttDayStartTime ,DATE_FORMAT(case when #{NextDayYn} ='Y' then DATE_ADD(str_to_date(concat(DATE_FORMAT(#{JobDate},'%Y%m%d'), #{EndTime}),'%Y%m%d%H%i'), INTERVAL 1 DAY) ELSE case when #{EndTime} = '2400' then DATE_ADD(str_to_date(concat(DATE_FORMAT(#{JobDate},'%Y%m%d'), '0000'),'%Y%m%d%H%i'), INTERVAL 1 DAY) ELSE str_to_date(concat(DATE_FORMAT(#{JobDate},'%Y%m%d'), #{EndTime}),'%Y%m%d%H%i') END END,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') oAttDayEndTime

SELECT COUNT(JobStsSeq) JobStsSeq FROM covi_smart4j.attendance_mng_job_history WHERE 1=1
(UserCode = #{item.UserCode} AND JobDate = #{item.WorkDate} AND #{item.StartTime} BETWEEN StartTime and EndTime)
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO covi_smart4j.vm_vacationinfo (VacYear, UR_Code, UR_Name, VacFlag, Sdate, Edate, VacDay, Reason, APPDATE, ENDDATE, WorkItemID, ProcessID, GUBUN, DEPUTY_NAME, DEPUTY_CODE, VacOffFlag ) (SELECT #{VacYear}, #{UserCode}, #{UrName}, #{VacFlag}, #{SDate}, #{EDate}, IF(IFNULL(Reserved3, 1) = '', 1, IFNULL(Reserved3, 1)), #{Reason}, #{AppDate}, #{EndDate}, #{WorkItemID}, #{ProcessId}, #{Gubun}, #{DeputyName}, #{DeputyCode}, #{VacOffFlag} FROM covi_smart4j.sys_base_code WHERE DomainID = (SELECT DomainID FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_domain WHERE DomainCode = #{CompanyCode}) AND CodeGroup = 'VACATION_TYPE' AND Code = #{VacFlag})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID();

INSERT INTO covi_smart4j.vm_vacationinfo (VacYear, UR_Code, UR_Name, VacFlag, Sdate, Edate, VacDay, Reason, APPDATE, ENDDATE, WorkItemID, ProcessID, GUBUN, DEPUTY_NAME, DEPUTY_CODE, VacOffFlag ) VALUES (#{VacYear}, #{UserCode}, #{UrName}, #{VacFlag}, #{SDate}, #{EDate}, #{VacDay}, #{Reason}, #{AppDate}, #{EndDate}, #{WorkItemId}, #{ProcessId}, #{Gubun}, #{DeputyName}, #{DeputyCode}, #{VacOffFlag})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID();
mapper.select: SELECT SchSeq , WorkSts , date_format(AttDayStartTime, '%H%i%s') as AttDayStartTime , date_format(AttDayEndTime, '%H%i%s') as AttDayEndTime , ifnull(NextDayYn, 'N') as NextDayYn , ifnull(ConfmYn, 'N') as ConfmYn , AttDayAC , AttDayIdle , WorkTime , WorkCode , UnitTerm , WorkApplyDate , MaxWorkTime , MaxWorkCode , MaxUnitTerm , MaxWorkApplyDate , AssYn , AssSeq , WorkZone , WorkAddr , WorkPointX , WorkPointY , AllowRadius , StartZone , StartAddr , StartPointX , StartPointY , EndZone , EndAddr , EndPointX , EndPointY , Etc FROM covi_smart4j.attendance_mng_job b WHERE JobDate = #{SelectDate} AND UserCode = #{UserCode} AND CompanyCode = #{CompanyCode}
